context: Large environmental nonprofit organization seeking to optimize fundraising operations through digital transformation

request.purpose: Implementation of integrated fundraising platform and donor management system
request.justification: Increase fundraising efficiency and donor engagement to support expanded program delivery

decision_process.outcome: Identified critical gaps in donor management and fundraising automation
Approved implementation plan with allocated budget

business_impact.expected_outcome: 30% increase in fundraising efficiency and 25% improvement in donor retention
business_impact.projected_value: $2,500,000 in additional program funding over 3 years

lessons_learned: Digital transformation in nonprofits requires significant change management and staff training investment
